name: Soviet Blast
description:
A 3D Point and Click game based in a soviet office.

You play as a civilian who is held captive by drunk soviets. You were captured during a raid in your hometown. You have been transferred to a research office without anyone in it anymore. The people that have worked have been dead for some time. They have died because of starvation or being exposed to chlorine gas.

Note that the currently available version is an unfinished demo, so it may have some bugs.

Game Controls: Left click to interact with item / go to object and right click to go back.
